Participate in Independent Study at PT. Microsoft Indonesia was an interesting and valuable experience for me. Thank you Microsoft, thank you MariBelajar, thank you mentor Agus Suparno  and his mentor assistant (Indra Gunawan), without all of you I would never have had the opportunity to get through my amazing and stunning semester this year. From my deepest heart, Thank You.

Saya Trianto Haryo Nugroho, mahasiswa Ilmu Aktuaria Universitas Binawan telah mengikuti program Studi Independen Bersertifikat @kampusmerdeka.ri . Program ini bisa berupa kursus singkat, bootcamp, kursus daring terbuka secara besar-besaran (MOOC) dan lain-lain.

Diselenggarakan selama 4 bulan (30 Agustus 2021 – 23 Desember 2021). Dibimbing oleh seorang mentor Bapak Charles Bernando, S.Si., M.A., Ph.D.   yang merupakan dosen dan praktisi data scientist dan asisten mentor Yuga Samuel yang merupakan mahasiswa berprestasi.

Studi Independen Bersertifikat ini telah meningkatkan softskill dan hardskill saya di bidang Data dan Artificial Intelligence sesuai tantangan nyata di dunia industri 4.0. Saya juga mendapatkan relasi mahasiswa-mahasiswa terbaik dari seluruh Indonesia, kesempatan mengikuti 4 x sertifikasi internasional Microsoft : DP-900 (Azure Data Fundamentals), AI-900 (Azure AI Fundamentals), dan PL-900 (Power Platform Fundamentals dan menyelesaikan Capstone Project di Bidang Kesehatan yang menambah kompetensi portofolio.

When it comes to IT, there are many topics to talk about. As someone who's always interested in learning new things, I was confused about what I wanted to be in the future. Programmer? Designers? System Administrators? There are so many choices that I feel like I have no purpose in life. Until one day, my friend told me that he had made an application, but was confused about how to make the application he made accessible to others. He had thought about deploying his application to the cloud, but he didn't understand how to do it. Then I thought since a lot of people want to be programmers and make things, what if I become the person who supports their work by becoming a cloud administrator?

That's why since August 30, 2021, I have participated in a certified independent study program organized by Microsoft Indonesia with the topic of learning Cloud Fundamentals. In this course, I learned a lot about Microsoft Azure as a cloud computing platform that can be used for various things, from deploying web applications to training Machine Learning models. Apart from taking classes, I was also required to design and build a cloud solution to a problem so that I had real hands-on experience. In this program, I can also take international certification from Microsoft a maximum of 4 times, which with these certificates I can get more job opportunities.

When it comes to IT, it's not just about programming. There's a lot to learn, and I think cloud computing will be a highly sought-after skill in the future. Joining the Microsoft Indonesia independent study program made me ready to face that future, and I also recommend you to join it.

Saya Cecep Wahyu Cahyana, mahasiswa Teknologi Informasi UNY 2019, berkesempatan untuk menjadi bagian program Studi Independent @kampusmerdeka.ri batch 1 bersama Microsoft Indonesia, program yang dipelopori oleh @microsoft Indonesia bersama @maribelajar_id ini bertujuan untuk membentuk mahasiswa untuk dapat siap terjun ke dalam dunia kerja. Program ini mengekspos para mahasiswa untuk mempersiapkan keahlian yang relevan dengan bidangnya masing-masing, salah satunya adalah bidang Data and Artificial Intelligence yang saya ikuti.

Dalam program Data and Artificial Intelligence (AI) ini saya mempelajari tahapan pengolahan data mentah untuk dapat diterjemahkan, diolah, divisualisasikan, dan kemudian dapat dijadikan laporan untuk membantu proses manajemen dan pengolahan data perusahaan, dengan menggunakan Machine Learning (ML) dan juga Power BI. Kompetensi lain yang saya dapatkan dari pelaksanaan program ini adalah pengembangan aplikasi, penerapan Artificial Intelligence (AI) dalam berbagai bidang industri, dan juga pembuatan Chatbot. Muara dari semua itu tentunya adalah untuk meningkatkan operasional bisnis dari perusahaan.

Hi everyone! 

I'm Angelina Novianti Winarlie, an Information Systems student from Bina Nusantara University. I want to share one of my recent studying experiences. From 30 Agustus - 23 December 2021, I became a part of Kampus Merdeka Independent Student for Cloud Fundamental Track with MariBelajar and Microsoft. This program is one very wonderful experience for me. It led me to gain many new experiences and knowledge about Cloud Computing with Microsoft Cloud Azure. I learned and took exams in Azure Fundamentals, Power Platform Fundamental, Security Compliance and Identity Fundamentals, and Azure Administrator Associate through self-paced studying with Microsoft Learn and online synchronous & asynchronous classes with the class mentor and assistant mentor. Furthermore, I managed to make one capstone project at the end of this program. It helps me get fundamental knowledge about Azure and helps me prepare for my future career. 

At first, it was not easy for me to adjust to this program since this was the first time I was introduced to Cloud Computing. There were new challenges that I needed to face for this new knowledge. I learn that there are still many things that I still don't know about Information Technology. To learn about Azure Cloud Computing as one of the most demanded technologies these days is such an incredible opportunity that I can experience this year. Amazingly, this program opens competitive opportunities with international colleagues by providing Microsoft international certifications. 

Lastly, I want to say that I feel really honored to able to become one of the students of this remarkable program. Thank you to @microsofteducationindonesia, @maribelajar_id, @kampusmerdeka.ri, Mentor Mr. Paulus Insap Santosa, Assistant Mentor Muhammad Revin Arnan, and all the participants for guiding and helping me through this whole program. I hope we can achieve all of our dreams. 

Hope to meet you guys again!

Di kegiatan ini saya juga belajar Management waktu yang baik, karena kegiatan kuliah di luar dan dalam kampus yang sama-sama berjalan. Walaupun sedikit kesulitan, tetapi dengan management waktu tersebut alhamdulillah dapat berjalan dengan baik. 
Manfaat lain dari program ini adalah mendapatkan sertifikasi keahlian di Bidang ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FUNDAMENTAL (AI-900). Perjuangan yang cukup melelahkan namun menggembirakan karena lulus dengan cukup baik.

Dan kepada Mas Mauludy, terimakasih karena sudah membantu pelaksanaan teknis kegiatan ini. 
Kepada rekan mentee kelas DAI-004, terimakasih sudah saling berbagi ilmu dan informasi juga sudah saling support dalam kegiatan pembelajaran secara sinkron dan asinkron. 
See you all. This is an unforgettable experience.

Hello! I am Cici Soviani Yuniar from Universitas Padjadjaran. I will briefly tell you about my experience in joining Microsoft Certified Independent Study.

Microsoft's mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Microsoft is committed to providing technology training in today's cloud-based era and enhancing digital skills to Indonesian students through the Microsoft Certified Independent Study Program. In this program, MariBelajar was appointed as a partner to help Microsoft Indonesia organize all of the activities. Taking part in this program is an honor for me.

The learning track I chose was Microsoft Productivity: The Modern Workplace. The learning materials taught in this learning track are Microsoft Office Specialist: Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint; Microsoft 365 Fundamentals; and Microsoft Power Platform Fundamentals. The material provided is very helpful in providing solutions to real-world problems. They are easy to follow and are practical tools to use in our working lives. Mentors who guide this program are professional experts.

Capstone Project is one of the components of the final assessment in this program, this project provides a real solution to the challenges and needs of the industry in developing a business. Thanks to Microsoft Indonesia and MariBelajar, who have given me a great opportunity to learn and develop my digital skills in this program for four months. All the lessons and certifications provided will help me in improving my professional competence which is useful in this digital era.

Perkenalkan, saya Lamtiur Verawaty Simbolon. Mahasiswa Universitas HKBP Nommensen sekaligus alumni Magang Studi Independen Bersertifikat (MSIB) Cyrcle 2 dengan jalur pembelajaran Modern Educator.

Periode kegiatan ±5 bulan, benar-benar memberikan insight luar biasa buat saya. 
1. Pembelajaran yang menyenangkan dengan mentoring dari Mentor yang hebat dan pendampingan Co-Mentor baik di sesi sinkronus maupun asinkronus. Didukung pula oleh perangkat pembelajaran yang mumpuni membuat Mentee merasa nyaman walau sistemnya online.
2. Menambah Hard Skill dan melatih Soft Skill saya. Jujur, konsep Merdeka Belajar benar-benar mengena. Karena di perkuliahan biasa, saya mungkin tidak bisa mengcover hal ini sepenuhnya. Pendidik yang modern dan penuh inovasi yang terintegrasi dengan ICT. Hal ini seakan menggambarkan harapan pendidikan di masa depan.
3. Relasi dan persahabatan.  Bertemu dan belajar bersama teman-teman dengan background prodi yang beragam benar-benar memacu semangat saya. Sharing, diskusi dll membuat pikiran saya semakin terbuka bahwasanya isi kepala hanya bisa terealisasi dengan membagikannya dengan rekan. Saya juga semakin terlatih dalam hal mengenal karakter seseorang, keterampilan interpersonal, menurunkan ego dan mendahulukan kepentingan bersama diatas kepentingan pribadi.
4. Kesempatan mengikuti sertifikasi Internasional secara gratis sesuai jalur pembelajaran
5. Pengakuan konversi SKS di Kampus Asal.
6. Bantuan kuota internet setiap bulan. 

"Untuk menjadi lebih, usahakan dirimu berbeda, satu langkah lebih maju dari mereka"
.

Memberikan kesepatan kepada Mahasiswa untuk belajar dan mengembangkan diri melalui aktivitas diluar kelas perkuliahan. Bagi mahasiswa yang ingin belajar atau berkembang diindustri digital dan memberikan peluang baru untuk sejumlah pekerjaan yang bersifat digital. 

Mau tau jalur pembelajaran apa aja yang ada di MariBelajar??? Pastinya berhubungan dengan yang sedang trend saat ini. 

Jeng….. Jeng…. Jengggggg….

2.	Data Anayst & AI 
3.	Microsot Data Engineer

1.	Tersedia subsidi kuota total Rp. 400.000,-/peserta
2.	Dana Beasiswa total 30 Juta Rupiah 
3.	Lisensi Microsoft 365 dengan penyimpanan cloud 1 TB

5.	Azure Lab Services,
